original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī byūhe pi siṅghāṭake pi purisena

original: saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhatipi sallapatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappeti dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṁ uyyojeti.
analyzed: saddhim ekena ikā santiṭṭhati pi sallapati nikaṇṇikam pi jappeti dutiyikam pi bhikkhunim uyyojeti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṁ
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā byūhe pi siṅghāṭake pi purisena saddhi

original: ekenekā santiṭṭhissatipi sallapissatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappissati dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṁ uyyojessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: ekena ikā santiṭṭhissati pi sallapissati pi nikaṇṇikam pi jappissati dutiyikam pi bhikkhunim uyyojessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāya api byūhe pi siṅghāṭake pi purisena

original: saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhatipi sallapatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappeti dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṁ uyyojetī”ti?
analyzed: saddhim ekena ikā santiṭṭhati pi sallapati nikaṇṇikam pi jappeti dutiyikam pi bhikkhunim uyyojeti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāya api byūhe pi siṅghāṭake pi

original: purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhissatipi sallapissatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappissati
analyzed: purisena saddhim ekena ekā santiṭṭhissati pi sallapissati pi nikaṇṇikam pi jappissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhim ekena ekā santiṭṭheyya

original: vā sallapeyya vā nikaṇṇikaṁ vā jappeyya dutiyikaṁ vā bhikkhuniṁ uyyojeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: vā sallapeyya vā nikaṇṇikam vā jappeyya dutiyikam vā bhikkhunim uyyojeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
yena iva pavisanti tena iva nikkhamanti

original: manussapuriso na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato viññū paṭibalo santiṭṭhituṁ sallapituṁ.
analyzed: manussa purisaḥ na yakkhaḥ na petaḥ na tiracchāna gataḥ viññū paṭibalaḥ santiṭṭhitum sallapitu
puriso ca iva hoti bhikkhunī ca
purisassa hattha pāse tiṭṭhati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: purisassa hattha pāse ṭhitā sallapati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anācāraṁ ācaritukāmā dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṁ uyyojeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: anācāram ācaritu kāmā dutiyikam pi bhikkhunim uyyojeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Dassanūpacāraṁ vā savanūpacāraṁ vā vijahantiyā āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: dassana upacāram vā savana upacāram vā vijahantiyāḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Hatthapāsaṁ vijahitvā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: hattha pāsam vijahitvā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Yakkhena vā petena vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahena vā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yakkhena vā petena vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagata manussa viggahena vā saddhim santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa
añña vihitā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā
